author: Al Jazeera
description: Emergency declaration follows heavy clashes between security forces and fighters in Mindanao's Marawi city.
title: Duterte declares martial law after Mindanao attack

author: Andreo Calonzo, Siegfrid Alegado
description: Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte placed the southern island of Mindanao under military rule Tuesday night after terrorists linked to Islamic State clashed with government troops in Marawi, the most populous city in the island’s Muslim region.
title: Duterte Puts Mindanao Under Martial Law After Terrorist Clashes

author: Al Jazeera
description: Residents flee Mindanao's Marawi city as fighters reportedly behead a local police chief and take churchgoers hostage.
title: Duterte considers martial law for entire Philippines

author: Frances Martel
description: Philippines President Rodrigo Duterte has threatened to expand a 60-day state of emergency in southern Mindanao to the whole country.
title: Duterte Says 'Spare No One' as Islamic State Beheads Police Chief, Stages Mass Prison Break

author: https://www.facebook.com/NBCNews
description: Duterte declared martial rule for 60 days in the entire southern Mindanao region to try to crush Muslim extremists who've occupied parts of a city.
title: Duterte vows "harsh" enforcement of martial law on Philippines island

author: Marc Jayson Cayabyab
description: Representatives from the militant Makabayan bloc in Congress on Wednesday opposed President Rodrigo Duterte's declaration of martial law in Mindanao, vowing to vote to revoke the proclamation once the President reports to Congress.
title: Militant solons oppose Duterte’s martial law declaration

author: JIM GOMEZ and TERESA CEROJANO
description: MANILA, Philippines (AP) — Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte warned Wednesday that he'll be harsh in enforcing martial law in his country's south as he abruptly left Moscow to deal with a crisis at home sparked by a Muslim extremist siege on a city, where militants burned buildings overnight and are feared to have taken hostages. Duterte declared martial rule for 60 days in the entire southern Mindanao region, the restive third of the Philippine archipelago, Tuesday evening to try to crush Muslim extremists who have aligned themselves with the Islamic State group and occupied a hospital, jail and other buildings and battled troops in an audacious attack in Marawi City.
title: Duterte declares martial rule in besieged south Philippines
